mapper.insert: insert into users(uid, upw, uadress_num, uadress, uadress_detail, uemail, ujointime) values (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{uadress_num}, #{uadress}, #{uadress_detail}, #{uemail}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where uid=#{uid}
select uid, upw from users where uid=#{uid} and upw=#{upw}
mapper.update: update userTable set sessionKey = #{sessionId}, sessionLimit = #{next} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select uid, upw from users where sessionKey = #{sessionId} and sessionLimit > now()
